item.title: Missing airboater’s body found in Peace River near Arcadia
item.description: The body of the boater was found in the river Monday afternoon.

item.title: Jacksonville Sheriff’s Office under review after body cam shows deputies punching driver during viral traffic stop
item.description: The driver repeatedly asked why he was being pulled over before being forced out of his vehicle.

item.title: Sarasota man jailed for repeatedly calling 911 after noise complaint
item.description: It happened on Lena Lane in Old Miakka Monday night after neighbors complained about loud music.

item.description: The work is scheduled to be finished by April 2026.

item.description: While hidden from deputies on the ground, the drone team had eyes on him the entire time.

item.description: Witnesses said the woman "was face down" in a man's lap.

item.title: Venice bank employee pleads guilty to embezzlement
item.description: The employee had sole access and control over a branch bank vault in Venice where she stole cash.

item.title: Keymani Dillingham training hard in offseason in efforts to go out on top in senior season at SSES
item.description: Dillingham is going into her senior year with the Falcons track and field program, and she knows that these are the moments where champions are made.

item.title: Groups object to Sarasota School Board changes to discrimination policy
item.description: The revisions would rewrite policies, eliminating lists of protected groups, in favor of more generic language.

item.title: From morning showers to evening boomers: Your next 48 hours, explained
item.description: Rain chances nearly vanish for the weekend!
